name: Close the navigation drawer using the 'Back' icon button
scenarioId: android/New_version_of_the_wallet_UI_UX_2/Menu_screen_Redesign_109/menuScreen:Close the navigation drawer using the 'Back' icon button
methodName: Close the navigation drawer using the 'Back' icon button

testSteps.description: Given the navigation drawer is open
When the user taps the back icon button
Then the navigation drawer slides away

userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to access the additional secondary options of the EUDI Wallet
  So that I can be informed about EUDI Wallet aspects (help, privacy notice), change my access PIN, view my notifications or exit the application

title: Close the navigation drawer using the 'Back' icon button
